meanings.definition: More fashionable or exciting than before.
meanings.sent1: The new jacket is groovier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The party was much groovier than I expected.
meanings.sent3: Her groovier outfit made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The groovier music lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The groovier dance moves were the highlight of the night.

meanings.sent1: The ice cream was groovier than the cake.
meanings.sent2: The weather today is much groovier than yesterday.
meanings.sent3: His groovier jokes always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The groovier scenery took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The groovier movie ending left everyone smiling.
